description:
DS4Windows is an open-source program that emulates an Xbox 360 controller, enabling use of a DualShock 4, DualSense, Switch Pro, and JoyCon controllers on a PC.


- Fixed auto profile routine when a device does not exist for an input slot
- Update Portuguese translation.
  Contribution by Denellyne
- Close ProfileMigration instances in unit tests when finished
- Removed unused Net8NoticeWindow class
- Fixed Jays2Kings stick dead zone migration check.
  Carry over non-zero dead zone choice
